item.title: Needs more prrrroooomotions
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:116, topic:408257”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=509540.msg3704042#msg3704042 date=1312926368]

[quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=509540.msg3703595#msg3703595 date=1312905359]

As far as promoting server moderators to server administrators, there is no reason to do so. The only power admins have over moderators is the power to set the spawn point to someplace else, which we don’t do anyhow.
[/quote]What about removing residences? I take it only you and davidi can do that.

I’ve never had to do that, they remove themselves after 14 days.
[/quote]So if a griefer protects an unprotected region of someones property, they’d have to wait 14 days for it to expire?

I’m starting to think this server is a lot more fun for griefers than honest players…

That has never happened, I guess if it did, I’d probably remove it. But lets not start trying to come up with solutions to problems that don’t exist.

@noobs ftw, I’ve never advertised this server.[/quote]
It did to me…
but i got hold of the guy who did it and he removed it.

Read full topic

Griefers look for servers that they can easily access without punishment (until they get caught).

Honestly all you will say is that it will kill the server and honestly, how it is going to be worse off than it is now?

Plus I can’t even moderate efficiently if I have to wait for videos or screenshots to get proof.[/quote]
Well then just get a list of trusted members. Everyone knew kani basami flew, Idk why he wasnt banned earlier.

item.title: Needs more prrrroooomotions
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

I thought people agreed the points would be given manually by official staff, not automatically from posting reports. It’s basically a more manageable way of distributing power around the server, rather than giving a few more staff members full power and running the risk of them abusing it. And as the power is distributed between active players, there’s more chance of being able to ban a rule breaker.

Staff giving players these points is almost exactly the same as giving players moderator status, only they have significantly less power. I’m not talking about handing the points out to everyone, just people who could potentially make good moderators but maybe can’t be trusted with full mod power.

[quote=“badger41, post:91, topic:408257”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=509540.msg3698704#msg3698704 date=1312600687]
Nah thats too easy i think every 5 reports = 1 point.
[/quote]

unethical, not sure if youre considering the fact that if youre never griefed you wont need to post reports therefore you wont get any points…[/quote]If you rarely get griefed then you can just report on the forums as usual?

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:93, topic:408257”][quote author=Cole1497 link=topic=509540.msg3698715#msg3698715 date=1312601012]
No. No point system whatsoever.
[/quote]

it would just cause problems you could just get a bunch of points and then ban someone who annoys you lol[/quote]
Yep, you would be able to spend months earning the reputation of the staff just to blow it all on someone who can just be unbanned. Oh wait, you can do that already.

@tom, I’ll think up how much MC Points count for in a vote, and how long you have to wait before voting again, but only if mopar agrees because I’m 90% sure he wont do something as different as this.

Read full topic
